title: Google pixel availability on Flipkart
content: Hi, Since August we were waiting for pixel4a to launch in india, now we are not able to buy it on flipkart. So many people have complained about this issue with you guys. you guys are not even caring about indian customers. I would request you to make pixel4a available everywhere and not in flipkart. Donâ€™t loose the trust of indian customers. Flipkart have a very worst service now a days.
